籥字的基本解释

籥
yuè
同“龠”①。
古代通风鼓火器上的管子。
古同“钥”，锁钥。

籥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuè］
［《廣韻》以灼切，入藥，以。］
(1)古管乐器。在甲骨文中，本作“龠”。象编管之形，似为排箫之前身。有吹籥、舞籥两种。吹籥似笛而短小，三孔；舞籥长而六孔，可执作舞具。
(2)鼓风吹火的竹器。
(3)通“鑰”。锁钥。
(4)关闭。参见“籥口”。
(5)古代儿童习书所用的竹简。
(6)一种古代量器。圆口，平底，有长柄，柄端有环。

籥字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　籥； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页905第18
【唐韻】【廣韻】以灼切【集韻】【類篇】【正韻】弋灼切【韻會】弋約切，?音藥。【廣韻】樂器，似笛。【爾雅·釋樂】大籥謂之產，其中謂之仲，小者謂之約。【註】籥，如笛，三孔而短小。【廣雅】籥，七孔。【詩·衞風】左手執籥。【傳】籥，六孔。【周禮·春官】籥師掌敎國子舞羽龡籥。【註】文舞有持羽吹籥者，所謂籥舞也。【禮·文王世子】秋冬學羽籥。【疏】籥，笛也。籥聲出于中冬，則萬物藏于中云。又【明堂位】土鼓、蕢桴、葦籥，伊耆氏之樂也。【釋名】籥，躍也。氣躍出也。　又【說文】書僮竹笘也。　又與鑰同。【書·金縢】啓籥見書。【疏】籥，開藏之管。【禮·月令】孟冬愼管籥。　又星名。【星經】天籥七星，在斗杓第二星，主關籥開閉。【周天大象賦】天籥司其啓閉。

籥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
籥字的起名意思

指古管乐器，也指锁钥。

Sorrow
Basic explanation of words
Sorrow
yuè
Same as "龠"①.
The pipe on the ancient ventilating drum firearm.
Gu Tong "key", lock key.
Sorrow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuè］
["Guang Yun" is used as medicine, with scorching cut, with. ]
(1) Ancient wind instruments. In oracle bone inscriptions, this is called "龠". It looks like a tube, like the predecessor of the pan flute. There are two kinds of blowing and dancing. The blowing flute is as short as a flute, with three holes; the dancing flute is long and six holes, and can be used as a dance tool.
(2) Bamboo ware that blows fire and wind.
(3) Communication "key". Lock key.
(4) Close. See "Yikou".
(5) Bamboo slips used by ancient children to study books.
(6) An ancient measuring instrument. Round mouth, flat bottom, long shank, and ring at the shank end.
Sorrow

[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　籥; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 905, 18
[Tang Yun] [Guang Yun] Zhuoqie [Jiyun] [Class Chapter] [Zheng Yun] Yizhuoqi [Yunhui] Yiyueqie, a sound medicine. [Guang Yun] An instrument, like a flute. [Erya·Shile] Daxue is called the property, among which it is called the middle, and the small is called the contract. 【Note】Hu, like a flute, three holes and short. [Guang Ya] He, seven holes. [Poetry·Weifeng] The left hand is holding Yu. [Biography] Hu, six holes. [Zhou Li·Chun Guan] Master Xie is in charge of the dance of the national child, Yu Xie. [Note] In Wenwu, there are people who hold feathers and blow 籥, the so-called 籥 dance is also. 【Rite·Wen Wang Shizi】Learn the feathers in autumn and winter. 【Sparse】Hu, flute. When the sound comes from midwinter, everything is hidden in the cloud. Also [Mingtang location] Tugu, Kuiyun, Weiyi, the joy of the Yiqi family. 【Release Name】Yue, Yue Ye. Qi jumped out also.　[Said the text] The book boy bamboo slipper also.　Same as the key again. 【Book·Jinyu】Qiyi sees the book. 【Sparse】Hua, open the control of Tibet. 【Rite·Yue Ling】Meng Dong stunned.　Also star name. 【Star Classics】The Seven Stars of Tian Ao, the second star in Dou Piao, the main switch is to open and close. 【Zhou Tian Elephant Fu】Tianluo is responsible for its opening and closing.
